Half-Life 2 review
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Pros:
+ FPS
+ Sequel of Half-Life (I recommend playing the first part first)
+ Great storyline
+ One of the best games I have played
+ Graphics still feel good
+ The game is not too long
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons:
-The sequel is split in Half-Life 2 Episode One and Two instead of Half-Life 3
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Do I recommend Half-Life 2?
Yes

After owning but never playing the Half-Life games for over five years, I finally went through and played through the series. What I found were games that not only just introduced fun and amazing mechanics but incorporated them in such a way that demonstrates absolute mastery for a craft. Each chapter and corresponding puzzles were designed with the perfect amount of difficulty and walked the line between hard and easy. They were hard enough to where I had to really think and account for the resources available in each unique scenario, but easy enough so I didn't get lost and frustrated. Combine that with exhilarating FPS combat and a fantastic story and you will find yourself with one of the best series of games in history.

Oh, that Episode 2 ending? Yeah, now I get the hype around Half-Life 3.

I'm not nostalgic for this game, I played it for the first time in 2021. Even though the game is over 15 years old, it still holds up today. The controls and physics are incredibly fun, and the story kept me wanting to see what happens next, and where I would end up. Great game. Must play.

Free flowing, easy to follow, fun game. Nothing else really like it. Only one part of the game was bad, that was the "Follow Freeman" chapter, it was just super difficult compared to everything else. Other than that, completely flawless, super fun, everyone should play this at least once. The physics are fun, once you get a certain weapon later on you unlock a whole new aspect of the game. Amazing.
2021 and it is still fun, but where is HL3

After playing HL 1 almost 20 years ago, this brought in a refreshing and a bit of nostalgic feeling. A different twist and continuation of the original story, but still fun. One negative is that some of the chapters felt like they were extended for no particular reason rather than more shooting/driving, so at those moments the game felt like it was dragging a little.

Overall, I would highly recommend it to anyone that enjoyed the first in the sequel.

Rating: 7/10

This game is just a complete masterpiece. I bought this game when i was sick and had to stay home, and i dont regret buying this. When i finished it i became a Half-Life fan immedatly. Now i need to play Episode One and Two. If you have the money then buy this game. You will not regret buying it!

Contiene spoilers!!
La verdad es que para mi el juego es una obra maestra, los personajes, las fisicas (en lo que mas destaca), animaciones faciales, armas, historia, mapas y graficos (para su epoca). Cada nivel esta muy bien hecho, y trae una mecanica nueva, como por ejemplo ravenholm con la pistola anti-gravedad o nova prospekt con las hormigas leon. La calificacion del juego para mi es de 10 de 10 uno de los shooters mas revolucionarios y que a pesar de tener varios problemas en su desarrollo supo mantenerse firme, concorde a lo que se esperaba.
Mi parte favorita del juego es Nova Prospekt, puedes comentar cual es tu parte favortia del juego si quieres.

Half-Life 2 is more than just a fun game with an unreleased meme of a sequel. Half-Life 2 is one of the greatest achievements in video game history.  Its innovations in technology, gameplay, and storytelling put it leagues above the competition at the time, and over 15 years later, the game is as fun as ever to play from beginning to end.  This game's first playthrough is something purely magical that every gamer should experience.  Getting sucked into the thick atmosphere and world is just so enjoyable in Half-Life 2.  If you want a game with an economic length but a titanic level of replayability, then this is your game.

Embora Half-Life tenha sido um marco nos jogos de tiro em primeira pessoa, possuía muitos defeitos, como bugs de script; dublagem (embora divertida) de má qualidade; um 3º ato horroroso; etc. Half-Life 2 corrige todos esses erros, e expande em tudo que fez o original tão bom, alcançando tudo que o primeiro tentou (e em certos casos falhou) alcançar.

Seja pela falta de habilidade ou tecnologia, estava claro que as ambições da Valve para Half-Life eram maiores do que eles conseguiam alcançar. Felizmente, 6 anos depois, após muita prática e com a nova Source Engine, eles finalmente alcançaram o que queriam. Modelos e texturas de NPCs e armas estão muito mais detalhados, possibilitando maior imersão no jogo. A dublagem e design de som também são muito superiores do que da última vez, mas a melhor adição sem sombra de dúvidas é a incorporação de físicas ao jogo.

"Se algo se parece com madeira, então soa como madeira, arranha como madeira, flutua como madeira e se você atirar, vai se quebrar como madeira." Essas palavras foram ditas na E3 de 2003 e o jogo segue essa regra estritamente. Múltiplos puzzles são focados na utilização de físicas para serem resolvidos, o combate é focado em físicas e não podemos nos esquecer da lendária Gravity Gun, cujo o foco é, você adivinhou, físicas. Isso faz com que todo o jogo dê a sensação de ser uma tech demo, mas não no sentido ruim. Você sente que sempre está jogando um cenário produzido manualmente para ser o mais imersivo e inesquecível possível. Isso sem comentar a quantidade de cenários e momentos diferentes e criativos que o jogo possui.

Em resumo, Half-Life 2 corrige todos os erros do primeiro, e melhora tudo de bom do original. Sem sombra de dúvidas, esse é um dos melhores jogos de PC (ou até de todas as plataformas) de todos os tempos.

HL 1 did age well but can make you feel dizzy, while this one still hold.

This is considered a classic for a reason. It holds up extremely well, the art design is amazing, and I wish more games today would use physics as much as this one does.

ПЛЮСЫ:
1. Замечательная физика.
2. Глубокий и интересный сюжет.
3. Графика довольно хорошая, не смотря на то что игра 2004 года.
4. Отличный геймплей.
5. Русская озвучка лучше чем английская.

МИНУСЫ:
1. Нету 3-ей части.
